name: 2026 Infrastructure Programme
description: Structured replacement and modernisation of the core infrastructure platform across storage, networking, compute, and VDI. The objective is to introduce a new core network stack and Pure Storage arrays alongside the existing environment, migrate services in a controlled order, and retire legacy systems without disrupting business-critical operations.

tasks.title: Confirm backups and archive workloads
tasks.description: Verify all backups and archive workloads are on the existing archive platform and Wasabi before proceeding with legacy removal.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 1 - Legacy Removal**

This is the foundation task that must be completed before any legacy storage removal. All backups and archives must be confirmed on the archive platform and Wasabi to ensure no data loss during the cleanup phase.

tasks.title: Remove all four NAS units
tasks.description: Decommission and remove all four legacy NAS units from the environment.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 1 - Legacy Removal**

Remove all legacy NAS platforms as part of simplifying the storage fabric. Ensure all data has been migrated or archived before removal.

tasks.title: Migrate or delete remaining VM copies on Tegile
tasks.description: Identify and migrate or delete any remaining VM copies stored on Tegile storage before decommissioning.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 1 - Legacy Removal**

Ensure all VM copies are either migrated to the new platform or safely deleted before Tegile volumes are removed.

tasks.title: Remove Tegile Volumes 6 and 16 from Hyper-V
tasks.description: Remove Tegile Volumes 6 and 16 from Hyper-V cluster configuration.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 1 - Legacy Removal**

Remove legacy Tegile volumes from Hyper-V after all VMs have been migrated or deleted.

tasks.title: Clean up legacy vSwitches
tasks.description: Remove legacy virtual switches that are no longer required.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 1 - Legacy Removal**

Clean up legacy vSwitches that were associated with the old storage infrastructure.

tasks.title: Clean up legacy storage VLANs
tasks.description: Remove legacy storage VLAN configurations that are no longer needed.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 1 - Legacy Removal**

Remove legacy storage VLAN configurations as part of environment simplification.

tasks.title: Clean up orphaned snapshots
tasks.description: Identify and remove orphaned snapshots from legacy storage systems.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 1 - Legacy Removal**

Clean up orphaned snapshots to free up storage and simplify the environment.

tasks.title: Install new core switching stack
tasks.description: Install the new core switching stack in existing racks. This becomes the authoritative platform for all future services.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

**Objective**: Establish the permanent network fabric before any new storage or compute is introduced.

**Principle**: No Rework - New equipment connects only to the new core stack.

Install the new core switching stack in existing racks. This will become the authoritative platform for all future services.

tasks.title: Configure Management VLAN
tasks.description: Configure the Management VLAN on the new core switching stack.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

Configure the Management VLAN for infrastructure management traffic.

tasks.title: Configure Server VLAN
tasks.description: Configure the Server VLAN on the new core switching stack.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

Configure the Server VLAN for production server traffic.

tasks.title: Configure Storage VLAN
tasks.description: Configure the Storage VLAN on the new core switching stack.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

Configure the Storage VLAN for storage network traffic.

tasks.title: Configure VDI VLAN
tasks.description: Configure the VDI VLAN on the new core switching stack.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

Configure the VDI VLAN for Horizon VDI traffic.

tasks.title: Configure Cluster VLAN
tasks.description: Configure the Cluster VLAN on the new core switching stack.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

Configure the Cluster VLAN for cluster communication.

tasks.title: Configure new DMZ VLAN
tasks.description: Configure the new logical DMZ VLAN on the new core switching stack. This is part of the Security by Design principle.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

**Security by Design**: The new DMZ and tiered zoning model are embedded from day one.

Configure the new logical DMZ VLAN within the core stack to replace the legacy DMZ architecture.

tasks.title: Connect new core to Palo Alto firewalls
tasks.description: Connect the new core switching stack to the Palo Alto firewalls.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

Connect the new core switching stack to the Palo Alto firewalls to enable routing and security policies.

tasks.title: Validate routing
tasks.description: Validate routing configuration across all VLANs and security zones.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

Validate routing to ensure proper connectivity between VLANs and security zones.

tasks.title: Validate segmentation
tasks.description: Validate network segmentation and security zone isolation.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

Validate network segmentation to ensure proper isolation between security zones.

tasks.title: Validate security zones
tasks.description: Validate security zone configuration and access controls.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 2 - Core Network Stack Deployment**

Validate security zones to ensure proper access controls are in place.

tasks.title: Install Pure Storage Array 1
tasks.description: Install the first Pure Storage array as the long-term primary storage platform.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 3 - Primary Storage and Compute Introduction**

**Objective**: Establish the new production platform without impacting existing workloads.

**Principle**: Parallel Build - New infrastructure is installed alongside existing systems to avoid forced outages.

Install Pure Storage Array 1. This will serve as the primary storage platform for the new infrastructure.

tasks.title: Validate multipathing
tasks.description: Validate multipathing configuration for Pure Storage Array 1 to ensure redundancy and performance.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 3 - Primary Storage and Compute Introduction**

Validate multipathing to ensure proper redundancy and load balancing across storage paths.

tasks.title: Validate failover
tasks.description: Validate failover capabilities for Pure Storage Array 1 to ensure high availability.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 3 - Primary Storage and Compute Introduction**

Validate failover to ensure the storage array can handle component failures without service interruption.

tasks.title: Install new compute hosts
tasks.description: Install new compute hosts aligned to the new storage and network fabric.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 3 - Primary Storage and Compute Introduction**

Install new compute hosts that will connect to Pure Storage Array 1 and the new core network stack.

tasks.title: Attach compute hosts to Pure Storage Array 1
tasks.description: Attach the new compute hosts to Pure Storage Array 1.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 3 - Primary Storage and Compute Introduction**

**Outcome**: A fully modernised compute and storage platform is ready for service onboarding.

Attach the new compute hosts to Pure Storage Array 1 to complete the new platform setup.

tasks.title: Migrate Exchange to internal VIPs
tasks.description: Migrate Exchange services to internal Virtual IPs, removing dependency on Kemp load balancers.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 4 - Load Balancer Removal and DMZ Service Migration**

**Objective**: Remove Kemp dependency and transition services into the new DMZ model.

Migrate Exchange internal services to new VIPs, removing dependency on Kemp load balancers.

tasks.title: Migrate Exchange to external VIPs
tasks.description: Migrate Exchange external services to external Virtual IPs in the new DMZ.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 4 - Load Balancer Removal and DMZ Service Migration**

Migrate Exchange external services to new external VIPs in the new DMZ VLAN.

tasks.title: Migrate web services to svr-websites-01
tasks.description: Migrate web services to svr-websites-01, removing dependency on Kemp load balancers.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 4 - Load Balancer Removal and DMZ Service Migration**

Migrate web services to svr-websites-01, removing dependency on Kemp load balancers.

tasks.title: Deploy temporary load balancer for Horizon
tasks.description: Deploy a temporary load balancer solution for Horizon services during the migration period.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 4 - Load Balancer Removal and DMZ Service Migration**

Deploy a temporary load balancer for Horizon to support the migration process. This will be replaced in Phase 5 when Horizon is rebuilt.

tasks.title: Decommission Kemp load balancers
tasks.description: Decommission Kemp load balancers and legacy DMZ architecture after all services have been migrated.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 4 - Load Balancer Removal and DMZ Service Migration**

**Outcome**: All externally published services are detached from Kemp.

**Principle**: Rollback Capability - Previous platform remains intact until validation is complete.

Decommission Kemp load balancers and legacy DMZ architecture after all services have been successfully migrated and validated.

tasks.title: Deploy new UAGs into new DMZ VLAN
tasks.description: Deploy new Unified Access Gateways (UAGs) into the new DMZ VLAN for Horizon services.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 5 - Horizon Rebuild (VDI.seddon.co.uk)**

**Objective**: Migrate the first major workload onto the new infrastructure.

**Principle**: Migrate in Waves - Services move in logical stages, starting with low-risk/high-value platforms (VDI).

Deploy new UAGs into the new DMZ VLAN. These will provide secure external access to Horizon services.

tasks.title: Deploy new Connection Servers
tasks.description: Deploy new Horizon Connection Servers on the new compute and storage platform.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 5 - Horizon Rebuild (VDI.seddon.co.uk)**

Deploy new Horizon Connection Servers that will manage VDI sessions on the new infrastructure.

tasks.title: Build new Windows 11 images
tasks.description: Build new Windows 11 golden images for the Horizon VDI environment.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 5 - Horizon Rebuild (VDI.seddon.co.uk)**

Build new Windows 11 images optimized for the new infrastructure platform. These will provide improved performance for end users.

tasks.title: Migrate users to new environment
tasks.description: Migrate users from the old Horizon environment to the new environment in a controlled manner.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 5 - Horizon Rebuild (VDI.seddon.co.uk)**

**Principle**: Incremental Cutover - Migrate users in waves to minimize risk and validate the new platform.

Migrate users from the old Horizon environment to the new environment. This delivers early performance improvements for end users.

tasks.title: Decommission old Horizon environment
tasks.description: Decommission the old Horizon environment after all users have been successfully migrated.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 5 - Horizon Rebuild (VDI.seddon.co.uk)**

**Outcome**: Horizon runs entirely on the new core, storage, and compute.

Decommission the old Horizon environment after successful migration and validation. This completes the first major workload migration.

tasks.title: Install Pure Storage Array 2
tasks.description: Install the second Pure Storage array to provide additional capacity for production workloads.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 6 - Storage Expansion and Production Migration**

**Objective**: Complete the migration and retire the old platform.

Install Pure Storage Array 2 to provide additional capacity for production workload migration. Arrays are installed sequentially as per the programme approach.

tasks.title: Migrate production servers
tasks.description: Migrate remaining production servers to the new platform. Services move only once the new platform is proven.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 6 - Storage Expansion and Production Migration**

**Principle**: Migrate in Waves - Remaining production services move only once the new platform is proven.

**Principle**: Rollback Capability - Each phase leaves the previous platform intact until validation is complete.

Migrate remaining production servers to the new platform in controlled waves. Each migration is validated before proceeding.

tasks.title: Decommission legacy equipment
tasks.description: Decommission all legacy equipment after successful migration and validation of all services.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 6 - Storage Expansion and Production Migration**

**Outcome**: All services run on the new platform and legacy infrastructure is retired.

Decommission all legacy equipment after successful migration and validation. This completes the infrastructure modernisation programme.

tasks.title: Final validation and sign-off
tasks.description: Perform final validation of the complete infrastructure platform and obtain sign-off.
tasks.documentation:
**Phase 6 - Storage Expansion and Production Migration**

Perform final validation of the complete infrastructure platform, including:
- All services running on new platform
- Legacy infrastructure fully decommissioned
- Performance improvements validated
- Security posture confirmed
- Documentation complete

Obtain final sign-off to complete the programme.

milestones.title: Phase 1 Complete - Legacy Storage Removed
milestones.description: All legacy storage platforms removed and environment simplified. No dependencies on legacy SAN or NAS platforms.

milestones.title: Phase 2 Complete - Core Network Stack Deployed
milestones.description: New network fabric established as the authoritative platform for all future services. All VLANs configured and validated.

milestones.title: Phase 3 Complete - Primary Storage and Compute Ready
milestones.description: Fully modernised compute and storage platform ready for service onboarding.

milestones.title: Phase 4 Complete - Kemp Load Balancers Removed
milestones.description: All externally published services detached from Kemp. Legacy DMZ architecture decommissioned.

milestones.title: Phase 5 Complete - Horizon Rebuilt on New Platform
milestones.description: Horizon runs entirely on the new core, storage, and compute. First major workload migration complete.

milestones.title: Phase 6 Complete - Legacy Infrastructure Retired
milestones.description: All services run on the new platform and legacy infrastructure is retired. Programme complete.
